title.narrative: Forest Landscape Restoration in the Mayaga Region

description.narrative: To secure biodiversity and carbon benefits while simultaneously strengthening the resilience of livelihoods, through forest landscape restoration and upscaling clean technologies in selected Districts of Southern Province.

participating-org.narrative: REMA (Rwanda Environmental Management Authority), Gisagara, Ruhango, Nyanza and Kamonyi Districts
